name: Got Test
description:
Something I am working on is a Barbarian Manager game. Following a post on Reddit in regards to who would win in a fight between Game of Thrones Characters, for fun I adapted my code to set up a battle arena between the characters. 

In the knockout round, you can change both the combatant and their stats by clicking on their name. 

Note. Current stats have been pretty much randomly generated. If you have any suggestions then email me.
